state: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, move south. Once you get around to doing that, head west. And then, make an attempt to take a trip north. And then, head west. And then, attempt to head west. Once you finish that, make an attempt to take a trip north. With that accomplished, venture west. And then, attempt to head south. After that, make an attempt to go west. Then, go to the north. And then, try to travel north. Once you finish that, make an effort to go east. With that over with, move east. And then, go south. With that done, lift the coin from the floor of the bedroom. Got that? Good! -= Garage =- You find yourself in a garage. A normal kind of place. There is an unguarded exit to the south. > -= Garage =-0/1
-= Attic =- I am honoured to announce that you are now in the attic. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west. > -= Attic =-0/2

-= Cellar =- You've entered a cellar. You begin to take stock of what's in the room. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. > -= Cellar =-0/3

-= Dish-Pit =- Look at you, bigshot, walking into a dish-pit like it isn't some huge deal. You begin to take stock of what's here. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Dish-Pit =-0/4

-= Bedchamber =- Ah, the bedchamber. This is some kind of bedchamber, really great ordinary vibes in this place, a wonderful ordinary atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it. There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Bedchamber =-0/5

-= Basement =- I am sorry to announce that you are now in the basement. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. > -= Basement =-0/6

-= Cookhouse =- You are in a cookhouse. An usual kind of place. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Cookhouse =-0/7
-= Chamber =- You're now in a chamber. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. > -= Chamber =-0/8

-= Pantry =- Well, here we are in the pantry. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked. > -= Pantry =-0/9

-= Sauna =- You are in an ordinary kind of place. That is to say, you're in a sauna. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Sauna =-0/10
-= Playroom =- You have stumbled into the most normal of all possible playrooms. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. > -= Playroom =-0/11

-= Studio =- You arrive in an ordinary kind of place. That is to say, you're in a studio. You can barely contain your excitement. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. > -= Studio =-0/12

-= Canteen =- You find yourself in a canteen. A typical one. You can barely contain your excitement. There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Canteen =-0/13

-= Closet =- Of every closet you could have shown up in, you had to saunter into a standard one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Closet =-0/14

-= Bedroom =- You make another one of your grand eccentric entrances into a bedroom. You begin to take stock of what's here. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is a coin on the floor. > -= Bedroom =-0/15
